data.title: Monday Taco special
data.text: On Monday, they have $1 taco specials. Two tacos fill me up and three are enough for my boyfriend.  We also order a side of guacamole which is very good.  Good Value, Good Food

data.title: Great, authentic tacos.
data.text: Monday dollar taco night is great, but this place has good prices and delicious tacos anytime.  May be a little tricky to find but well worth it.  Seating is limited but worth the wait or takeout.

data.title: Good tacos
data.text: We have been going here for a while now. Always really good tacos ,it's a block west of Hollywood casino in downtown aurora. The service is very good as well. The prices are very reasonable ,the orchata is one of the best I've ever had so overall my family kind of small restaurant will definetly go back time after time,it's our place to eat Monday's .one very important thing to us is how clean it's kept.

data.title: Easy carryout in downtown Aurora
data.text: We were at an all day event at the Paramount Theater in downtown Aurora and had two meal times to consider.  Didn't want to do the standard fast food for both meals.  Happy to see this mom and pop Mexican restaurant around the corner from the theater.  Completely authentic Mexican food for sit down or carryout.  We kept it simple and just had a steak taco and a pork/al pastor taco.  Both were delicious and the salsas quite flavorful.  Prices are very reasonable.  Lots of families in the dining room and all of the food on the tables looked delicious.  We would definitely return!

data.title: Lovin' this place!
data.text: We are loving this place, and last night, bringing four "new" people, we're even more in love . .. While the place wasn't full, one poor, but very efficient wait person, had to handle everyone as other employees had called in sick.  She did an amazing job as well as the chef, who got food out promptly, efficiently, tasty and attractive.  We love the food here, have never had a bad experience . . and it's a great bang for the buck!  Our guests were very impressed, and we all plan to return.

data.title: Very authentic
data.text: I liked this restaurant.  The food was good, and the waitress was friendly.  They offer more than just Mexican cuisine.  They even had an ice cream bar.  I will go back again.
